thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York - Times Square Central - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: In the midst of everything
thread.title_full: In the midst of everything - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York - Times Square Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kerishat
title: In the midst of everything
text:
Location is perfect. Definitely central in times square. The view incredible. Stayed on the top floor. Towels are not great, found hair in the bed.
Overall, it was a good stay. Nothing is perfect. Booked way in advance so price was reasonable.
